name: Horse Girl Adventure 1992
description:
There are no secrets in the game. It was made for the Sweet to Sour Jam. https://itch.io/jam/the-sweet-to-sour-game-jam

Space: Advance Dialogue

ESC: Exit

This game was worked on from March 14 - March 18, 2023 

Coppercube "Do later" Extension: 

https://www.ambiera.com/coppercube/download_extensions.html

Sound FX from National Park Service: https://www.nps.gov/yell/learn/photosmultimedia/sounds-americanrobins.htm
